venues.title: O by Tamara,Thiruvananthapuram
venues.description: Nestled in the stunning coastal city of Trivandrum, O by Tamara captivates guests with its outstanding hospitality, grand banquets, and unrivalled wedding venue. our hotel offers a picturesque setting that sets the stage for memorable celebrations, catering to a variety of wedding traditions and customs.

venues.description: Amritara Hornbill Camp is a premium hotel located in the city of Ernakulam. venues.title: Niko Hotels,Kochi
venues.description: Niko Hotels is a wedding banquet hall located in Kochi. You can choose the banquet hall for your reception or a small sangeet or mehndi ceremony. The hotel staff and management's emphasis remains on your comfort and is of utmost importance.

venues.description: Your wedding is going to one of the most memorable events of your life. Located in Central Delhi, The Rajdhani Banquet Hall is one such venue space that provides the best of modern interiors will outstanding services to ensure that your wedding is a memorable one.

venues.description: However grand or intimate the celebration may be, Taj Malabar Resort & Spa, Cochin offers you a bespoke location and make sure that you and your guests enjoy their stay as well as, their experience with the hotel.
